triples.name: Schema (psychology)
triples.relevance: The paper reviews how schemas function as mental structures that organize and structure information for recall and perception.

triples.name: Recall (memory)
triples.relevance: The paper examines recall as a task where information structured by schemas is retrieved more easily from memory.

triples.name: Memory
triples.relevance: The paper discusses how schemas facilitate memory through their structuring function and organization of information.

triples.name: Stimulus (psychology)
triples.relevance: The paper analyzes how stimuli from the environment are matched against schemas and structured according to schema elements.

triples.name: Pattern matching
triples.relevance: The paper describes how schemas are matched against stimulus configurations from the environment as a pattern matching process.
